name: Greek Mythology, Part 3 Quiz | Greek Myth | 10 Questions

questions.text: Thetis, the mother of Achilles, was a member of what group of goddesses?
Of the Harpies, which was the 'Dark-one'?
Which of the Nereids became the wife of Poseidon, the god of the sea?
Which of the following was not a characteristic of the Graeae?
options: Shared one eye and one tooth
Called the 'Old Women of the Sea'

questions.text: All of the Gorgons were mortal. True or False?
questions.explanation:
False.

	Only Medusa was mortal, her two sisters Sthenno and Euryale were immortal.

questions.text: Aside from Pegasus, who was the other son produced by the union of Medusa and Poseidon?
questions.explanation:
Chrysaor.

	Chrysaor was a hero who had a golden sword.

questions.text: What creature was the mother of Orthrus, Hydra and Chimaera?
Where did Rhea hide baby Zeus, to save him from the fate of his siblings, being swallowed by Cronus?
questions.explanation:
Crete.

	She hid baby Zeus in a cave on Crete where he was raised.

Amalthea.

	Amalthea either tended goats or was a goat -- there are legends arguing both ways!

questions.text: How did Zeus release his siblings from his father Cronus?
